scripts.build: echo 'Installing Flutter...' && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.32.7-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && git config --global --add safe.directory /vercel/path0/flutter && flutter config --no-analytics --enable-web && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
